me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery

Class SMTPDeliveryAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery.SMTPDeliveryAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SMTPDeliverySessionConstants, SMTPClientConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LMTPDeliveryAgent

    public class SMTPDeliveryAgent
extends Object
implements SMTPClientConstants, SMTPDeliverySessionConstants
    SMTPDeliveryAgent which use the wrapped SMTPClientTransport to deliver email via SMTP
    Author:
    Norman Maurer
